agreement_structure.imposed_goal: To submit a review for at least three destinations visited in the past year.

This aligns perfectly with my desire to find quality dining options and enhances the overall travel experience.

required_participants.reasoning: Tourist customers are essential as they are the primary users of the platform. Their trust in the system and willingness to engage with the cryptocurrency rewards will drive the success and adoption of the new verification system.

resolution_description: "Рестораны could revolutionize the fight against fake reviews by creating a global alliance of restaurants that collectively utilize AI-driven sentiment analysis to authenticate customer feedback, while offering exclusive dining experiences to verified reviewers as a means of incentivizing honesty and building a trusted community."

agreement_structure.current_action: Implementing new menu items based on customer feedback
agreement_structure.imposed_goal: Achieve a 20% increase in customer visits within the next quarter
agreement_structure.imposed_action: Launch a targeted marketing campaign promoting weekly specials and loyalty programs
agreement_structure.mechanism: Utilize social media and email marketing to reach potential customers, along with customer surveys to gather feedback on promotions
agreement_structure.reasoning: The proposed resolution addresses the critical issue of fake reviews which negatively impact the restaurant industry. By creating a global alliance and utilizing AI-driven sentiment analysis, it offers a robust mechanism to authenticate customer feedback, thus enhancing the credibility of reviews. Additionally, the incentive for verified reviewers to enjoy exclusive dining experiences fosters a community of trust and encourages honest feedback. This approach aligns with the goal of increasing customer satisfaction and retention, as well as achieving a significant increase in customer visits. Overall, the proposal not only mitigates the fears associated with fake reviews but also supports the underlying interests of promoting authentic dining experiences.
